segments.text: Well , we've settled everything in connection with this transaction except the question of the mode of payment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because this order is a comparatively big one , we would like to pay by time L / C , say , 60 days L / C .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Payment by sight L / C is quite usual in international trade , and as a rule , we only accept payment by sight L / C .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But we have only moderate mean at hand . If you can do us a special favor this time and allow us to delay payment , we'd really appreciate it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Accepting time L / C is unusual and I've never done it before , but we could consider your request . I'll phone our company to see what they say .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your consideration . When will you let me know your answer ?
segments.speaker: S2
